Car.title: Car
Car.description: Represents a car listing in the Avşarlı Digital Showroom application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the car listing, managed by Firestore.

title.description: The title of the car listing.

year.description: The manufacturing year of the car.

km.description: The kilometers the car has traveled.

imageUrls.description: URLs of the images for the car.

listingUrl.description: URL of the original listing on the source website (optional).

sahibindenId.description: The ID of the listing on sahibinden.com (optional).

/cars/{carId}.description: Stores car listing data. Can be written by authenticated admins and read by public.
